name: Lesik and Lisa: The adventure on the balloon
name_original: Lesik and Lisa: The adventure on the balloon
description:
Lesik and Lisa love each other very much. But there's an ill luck, Lisa does not sit still, so Lyosik always has to look for her.
Help Lesik fly a balloon to Lisa with the help of a breeze.
The direction of the wind depends on which side of the ball you click on the screen.
 In the flight of Lesik will pursue danger. Take care not to burst the ball. 

Good luck to you!

    Once registered, you can play on any device (Android) under your login and password.
The best results are recorded in an online table!
